mapper.update:
update article
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mark_del_time = #{markDelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
page_views = #{pageViews,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mask = #{mask,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mark_del_time = #{markDelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, page_views = #{pageViews,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mask = #{mask,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
